replies.msg:
咁多位巴打你地好
小弟想砌部機
多數係玩Pubg/LoL
仲會剪下片 玩下VM
Budget係7-8千左右
我係網上睇過下啲list
想請教下我應該點揀


CPU: AMD RYZEN R7 1700 /
AMD RYZEN R5 1600
MB: Gigabyte GA-AB350-GAMING 3 /
ASRock AB350 Pro4 /
ASUS PRIME B350-PLUS

DisplayCard:
ASUS GeForce ROG STRIX GAMING GTX 1070 8GB GDDR5 /
Gigabyte GeForceR GTX 1070 WINDFORCE OC 8GB GDDR5 /
MSI GEFORCE GTX 1070 GAMING X 8G /
GALAX GeForce GTX 1070 EX 8GB

RAM:
G.Skill DDR4 Aegis Gaming Series 3000MHz 2x8GB /
Adata XPG Dazzle 8Gx2 3000 MHz DDR4 RGB LED

PSU: Antec NeoEco II Series NEO-ECO2-550 80Plus Bronze 550W PSU

唔知有無啲位可以調整

諗住用返之前個部嘅SSD同HDD
SSD:
KINGSTON SV300 120G ATA
KINGSTON SV300 240G ATA
HDD:ST 500G
唔同牌子其實一樣 都係睇彩數

打機多就1600+1070
剪片多就1700+1060

1700+1070好似over少少budget

CPU: AMD RYZEN R7 1700 3.0GHz 16M L3 8 Core 16 Thread 65W AM4

主機板 :ASUS ROG STRIX X370-F GAMING

顯示卡:ASUS, NV, GTX1080 STRIX GAMING, 8GB GDDR5X

RAM: G.SKILL Flare X Series F4-3200C14D-16GFX DDR4 3200MHz 16GB

火牛:Corsair 海盜船 RM 750x/750W Fully Modular ATX PowerSupply,10 Years Warranty (80PLUS GOLD)(CP-9020090-NA)

HDD: Toshiba 3TB

SSD:256GB Samsung SM961 NVMe MLC SSD

機箱: nzxt s340 elite

光碟機: ASUS External Slim DVD Writer SDRW-08D2S-U LITE
呢個係我條list比你作為參考一用，不過有更多巴打喜歡1600+1080ti
